error.400: There was an error in the request, and the server did not create or modify data.
error.401: The user does not have permissions.
error.403: The user is authorized, but access is prohibited.
error.404: The request was made for a record that does not exist, and the server did not perform an operation.
error.422: When creating an object, a validation error occurred.
error.500: A server error occurred. Please check the server.
error.503: Services are unavailable and the server is temporarily overloaded or maintained.
error.haveError: Have an error occurred. Please try again.

common.greetingChat: You can talk with another now.
common.name: Name
common.requireAddressForSwop: Please add your address before doing SWOP with other users.

onBoarding.contentOnboardingLike: Swipe right to Like and left to Dislike clothes of women around you.
onBoarding.contentOnboardingMatch: If you like some dress that belongs to someone and if that someone also likes a dress that belongs to you, there's a match!
onBoarding.contentOnboardingSwap: Out of the many matches, you can choose which match you’ll like to swap with. We'll take care of the rest ;-)

login.title: Please enter your valid phone number. We will send you 4-digit code to verify your phone.

verifyOTP.title: Enter 4-digit Code code we have sent to you at

getStarted.letsGet: Let's get to know each other better...
getStarted.yourProfilePhoto: Your profile photo will not be seen by other users. We will not disclose your name to other users either. These are needed to help shippers identify you while picking & dropping off clothes. You can edit these anytime on your profile page later too.
getStarted.whatSizedClothes: What sized clothes do you wear often?
getStarted.onlyShowThatFit: We'll only show you clothes that will almost fit you.
getStarted.canEditLater: You can edit your size preference on your profile page later too.
getStarted.pleaseChooseAnAddress: Please choose an address from where you expect to have pick & drop often. It could be your home or your workplace.
getStarted.locationNote: This will route you to Google Places to help you pick the address more conveniently.
getStarted.locationDescription: You can edit your address on your profile page later too. You can swap clothes with others in the same city, so during a swop, you can request a pick ot drop at a different address but only within the same city. Not all swop options (Meet-in-person, Laundry Pick & Drop, Home Delivery) are available in all cities yet. New cities will be added soon.
getStarted.inputEmailTitle: You can login via email too
getStarted.inputEmailNote: You can also login via your recovery email in case you ever lose your phone or when you're travelling and cannot get OTP on your mobile number. And, we don't intent to spam you or send you any weekly emails ;)

wardrobe.yourDressesUnavailable: Your dresses would be temporarily unavailable to others for swopping

dressPage.canSwop: You can swop the above dress with any of the dresses below.
dressPage.dressIsDelisted: To get more matches, please list te dress.
dressPage.delistNote: If you delist, the dress will not be shown to others for swopping.
dressPage.editNote: If you edit the page, all the Like (& Dislikes) received by it till now, will be lost. It'll be like making a fresh start.
dressPage.withThisLooks: With this you can get these looks
dressPage.modalEditQuestion: Are you sure you want to edit?
dressPage.modalEditNote:
If you edit this dress page, it will lose all the Likes (and well, also the Dislikes) it has received so far.

And, if someone has already proposed to swop with this dress or if you have already confirmed to swop this dress with someone, then that swop would have to be expired too.
dressPage.modalEditConfirm: Got it. I want to edit still
dressPage.modalEditCancel: It's good. I don't want to edit
dressPage.modalReportNote: If you find the content of this page offensive, please feel free to report it to us. we will look into it immediately and, if required, will remove this page from the app immediately. Please use this responsibly.
dressPage.otherDressFromWardrobeQuestion: Don't wish to see clothes from this in future?

denyUser.denyQuestion: Don’t think you’ll like clothes from her wardrobe?

matching.canSwop: Congratulations! This could be a swop.
matching.pickDateNote: If you like this Swop, please pick a date and time for us to pick your clothes. Else, you can choose to drop off your clothes at a convenient location near you
matching.pleaseSelectTimeSlot: Please select at least one timeslot
matching.noteTimeSlot: Don't worry. You can still cancel this Swop any time within the next 24 hours; cancellation made within this period will not impact users’ ratings. Happy Swopping!
matching.matchConfirm: After someone proposes a swop, you have 24 hours to confirm, failing which the swop is expired so that others can swop with them.

matchingDateTime.pleasePickDateTime: Please pick a date and time when you can give your clothes for the swop.
matchingDateTime.dontWorry: Don’t worry. You can still reschedule the pick-up to some other time within this week. Unfortunately, if you fail to hand over the clothes to the shipper. the swop would be cancelled. Happy Swopping!
matchingDateTime.attentionContent1: Please make sure that at the time of meeting for exchanging or returning clothes, the other person click on
matchingDateTime.attentionContent2: button on their app. And you should do the same.
matchingDateTime.meetInPersonNote: In ” Meet in Person” manner of swop, we have limited control over the counter swopper. It’s entirely up to your connection with your counter-swopper. All we’re saying, please be nice ;)
matchingDateTime.laundryNote: Please drop off your clothes within the next 1 week at the assigned laundry. Unfortunately, if you do not drop off your clothes until then, the swop would be cancelled to let others swop instead. Happy Swopping!

swopStatusDescription.proposed: After proposed someone, you have to wait your Counter-Swopper accepts up to 24 hours.
swopStatusDescription.confirmingChat: Your counter-swopper has proposed to swap by meeting you in person on {{dateTime}}. You can suggest another time and location that’s convenient to you over chat.

trackingStatusDescription.proposed: After proposed someone, you have to wait your Counter-Swopper accepts up to 24 hours.
trackingStatusDescription.accepted: Your swop was accepted by Counter-Swopper
trackingStatusDescription.denied: Your swop was denied by Counter-Swopper

matchingLogistic.canSwop: You can swop clothes by paying just a small Swop Fee by picking and dropping off clothes at a laundry near you.
matchingLogistic.canSwopDelivery: You can receive swopped clothes at the comfort of your home, for just a little bit extra
matchingLogistic.clickShowMap: Clickable and Opens on Google Maps
matchingLogistic.noteSwopFee: * Includes 2 complementary cleaning of your clothes – (i) when your clothes go out, and (ii) when they come back after swop
matchingLogistic.noteSwopFeeWarning: Payable in cash, at the time you receive your counter-swopper’s clothes
matchingLogistic.noteDelivery: Includes 4 trips of clothes (i) Your clothes from you to a laundry, (ii) Your counter-swopper’s clothes from a laundry to you, (iii)  Your counter-swopper’s clothes back from you to a laundry, and (iv) your clothes from a laundry back to you after the swop. Payable at the time of each delivery.
matchingLogistic.noteDeliveryWarning: Payable in cash, at the time of each delivery
matchingLogistic.chatTitle: You can swop your clothes by meeting the other user at a location and time that’s convenient to both of you. You two can chat on the Swop app for the next 30 days.
matchingLogistic.chatFeeNote: Charged only when the other user accepts the swop
matchingLogistic.laundryTitle: You can have the swopped clothes cleaned up professionally before they come to you. All you have to do is to pick & drop clothes at one of our partner laundries near you.
matchingLogistic.cleanServiceFeeDescription: Includes cleaning of clothes (i) when other person's clothes come to you for a swop, and (ii) when your clothes go back after the swop.
matchingLogistic.cleanServiceFeeNote: Payable to the laundry/dry cleaner at the time you pick clothes.
matchingLogistic.deliveryTitle: You can receive the swopped clothes at the comfort of your home (or office) for just a little extra. What’s more? The swopped clothes will be cleaned up professionally before they come to you.  All you have to do is to hand over your clothes to our partner local on-demand delivery service.
matchingLogistic.deliveryDescription: Includes 4 trips of clothes (i) your clothes from you to a laundry, (ii) other's clothes from a laundry to you, (iii)  other's clothes back from you to a laundry after the swop, and (iv) your clothes from a laundry back to you after the swop.
matchingLogistic.deliveryFeeNote: Payable to the shipper at the time of each pick & drop delivery.
matchingLogistic.notAllOptions: Not all options are available everywhere as of now.

profile.profileNote: This profile Image and profile name will only be seen by those with whom you swop clothes.
profile.addressNote: This address is used to match you with other users around you. We understand you might not be available at this address all the time. You can choose another pick & drop address for deliveries at your convenience.
profile.distanceNote: The more distance you pick, the more matches you’ll see from more users who are further away. But you might also have to pay more for delivery, or you might have to travel far for pick & drop.
profile.recoveryEmailNote: Should you lose your registered mobile number (the phone number used to login into the app), you can get OTP to login at this email address.
profile.profileNotVisible: Your profile is not visible to others
profile.referralSubTitle: Whenever anyone logs-in for the first time using your referral code, you both get a free swop
profile.creditReferralDescription: You can buy more swop tokens anytime. Also, when you refer a friend, we credit a free swop token to both of you! And during any swop, if your counter-swopper cancels the swops, we credit a free swop token to you.
profile.creditDescription: And, if your counter-swopper cancels a swop, we credit a free swop to you.
profile.plansTitle: Please buy some Swops to continue

createDress.title: Title
createDress.sizeHelper: To help us match this with the right users, please provide us the size in at least one of these ways.
createDress.noteHelper: The fields marked with the Asterix* are mandatory. Rest are optional. Though the more information you provide, the more users will be able to discover your clothes and the more matches you will get.
createDress.photoRequired: Please add at least 1 photo of your dress.
createDress.modalDeleteDress: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
createDress.modalConfirmBack: Are you want to List Dress or Save Draft?

swop.swopExpiredMessage: After someone proposes a swop, you have 24 hours to confirm, failing which the swop is expired so that others can swop with them.
swop.swopMeetInPerson1: Your counter-swopper has proposed to swap by meeting you in person on
swop.swopMeetInPerson2: You can suggest another time and location that’s convenient to you over chat.
swop.swopProposed: You proposed to swap by meeting counter-swopper in person on
swop.swopWaiting: A person proposed to swap by meeting counter-swopper in person on

adminHome.searchTitle: Please enter Swop Code or the last 4 digits of mobile number

adminLaundry.shippersAvailableNote: Each shipper can do ~900 pick & drops in a month. We will allocate only as many clothes as your staff can comfortably manage.
adminLaundry.addLocationMustBeDiffPhone: Must be different with location's phone
adminLaundry.addLocationMustBeDiffManagerPhone: Must be different with location manager's phone
adminLaundry.locationRequired: Must be add 1 laundry location at least
adminLaundry.locationManagerNote: Only the Manager can add/edit team members to the laundry. Also, it is the manager who can change the Pricing
adminLaundry.pricingNotes: For nearby laundries, the orders are routed to the laundry that offers a better price to the users. So, if you want to keep getting more orders, please offer users best prices.
adminLaundry.relationshipManagerNotes: For any issues, pelase contact your personal Relationship Manager
adminLaundry.reAssignHeader: Do you want to change laundry?

laundryHome.searchTitle: Please enter Swop Code or the last 4 digits of mobile number

swopStatusSubTitle.accepted: Congratulations. Please be ready to hand over your clothes
swopStatusSubTitle.proposed: A swop can be cancelled within 24 hours of being proposed
swopStatusSubTitle.waiting_accept: A swop can be cancelled within 24 hours of being proposed
swopStatusSubTitle.expired: A swop needs to be accepted within 24 hours
swopStatusSubTitle.pick_up_scheduled_chat: Please pick a convenient place and time over chat to swap clothes
swopStatusSubTitle.pick_up_scheduled_self: Please drop off clothes at {{laundryAddress}} by {{time}} on {{date}}
swopStatusSubTitle.pick_up_scheduled_laundry: Please be ready to hand over your clothes on {{date}} between {{timeSlot}}
swopStatusSubTitle.picked: You handed over your clothes for the swop
swopStatusSubTitle.un_picked: You did not hand over your clothes for the swop
swopStatusSubTitle.received: Your clothes have gone for cleaning
swopStatusSubTitle.ready: The swopped clothes are cleaned and ready for delivery
swopStatusSubTitle.delivery_scheduled_self: Please collect the swopped clothes at {{laundryAddress}} by {{time}} on {{date}}. Please pay {{fee}} at the laundry.
swopStatusSubTitle.delivery_scheduled_laundry: Please be ready to receive the swopped clothes on {{date}} between {{timeSlot}}
swopStatusSubTitle.delivery_assigned_self: Please collect the swopped clothes at {{laundryAddress}} by {{time}} on {{date}}
swopStatusSubTitle.delivery_assigned_laundry: Please be ready to receive the swopped clothes on {{date}} between {{timeSlot}}
swopStatusSubTitle.delivered: You have received the swopped clothes
swopStatusSubTitle.un_delivered: You can collect clothes at your convenience at {{laundryAddress}}
swopStatusSubTitle.pick_up_assigned: Please be ready to hand over your clothes on {{date}} between {{timeSlot}}. Please pay {{fee}} to shipper
swopStatusSubTitle.pair_killed: You're free to swop with other matches
swopStatusSubTitle.confirmed: A swop can be cancelled within 24 hours of being proposed
swopStatusSubTitle.early_return_proposed: Not loving the swopped clothes too much? No worries. Anytime within the next one week, you can request for an early return. If both of you agree, we'll have your clothes returned earlier.
swopStatusSubTitle.retention_proposed: Loving the swopped clothes too much? Anytime within the next one week, you can request to let you keep them for good. If both of you agree, we'll let you keep them forever.
swopStatusSubTitle.extension_proposed: Want to keep the swopped clothes for a little longer? Anytime within the next one week, you can request to extend the swop by a month. If both of you agree, we'll delay the return of swopped clothes by a month
swopStatusSubTitle.early_return_requested: Would you like to return the swopped clothes earlier?
swopStatusSubTitle.retention_requested: Would you like to keep the swapped clothes forever?
swopStatusSubTitle.extension_requested: Would you like to keep the swapped clothes for another month?
swopStatusSubTitle.retention_confirmed: You both can keep the swopped clothes forever
swopStatusSubTitle.extension_confirmed: You both can keep the swopped clothes for another month
swopStatusSubTitle.early_return_denied: Sorry, the other user would like to continue the swop for the entire month
swopStatusSubTitle.retention_denied: Sorry, the other user would not like to keep the swopped clothes forever
swopStatusSubTitle.extension_denied: Sorry, the other user would not like to extend the swop beyond the month
swopStatusSubTitle.return_pick_up_scheduled_chat: Please pick a convenient place and time over chat to return clothes
swopStatusSubTitle.return_pick_up_scheduled_self: Please drop off the swopped clothes at {{laundryAddress}} by {{time}} on {{date}}
swopStatusSubTitle.return_pick_up_scheduled_laundry: Please be ready to hand over the swopped clothes on {{date}} between {{timeSlot}}
swopStatusSubTitle.return_pick_up_assigned: Please be ready to hand over your clothes on {{date}} between {{timeSlot}}. Please pay {{fee}} to shipper
swopStatusSubTitle.return_picked: You handed over the swopped clothes for return
swopStatusSubTitle.return_un_picked: Your profile has been temporarily deactivated. To continue swopping clothes, please return clothes at the earliest at {{laundryAddress}}
swopStatusSubTitle.return_received: The returned clothes have gone for cleaning
swopStatusSubTitle.return_ready: Your clothes are cleaned and ready for delivery
swopStatusSubTitle.return_delivery_scheduled_self: Please collect your clothes at {{laundryAddress}} by {{time}} on {{date}}. Please pay {{fee}} at the laundry.
swopStatusSubTitle.return_delivery_scheduled_laundry: Please be ready to receive your clothes on {{date}} between {{timeSlot}}
swopStatusSubTitle.return_delivery_assigned_self: Please collect your clothes at {{laundryAddress}} by {{time}} on {{date}}
swopStatusSubTitle.return_delivery_assigned_laundry: Please be ready to receive your clothes on {{date}} between {{timeSlot}}
swopStatusSubTitle.return_delivered: You have received your clothes after the swop
swopStatusSubTitle.return_un_delivered: You can collect your clothes at your convenience at {{laundryAddress}}
swopStatusSubTitle.defaulted: Both users must return the swopped clothes on time. Else the defaulting user is barred for the swopping any more clothes. And, the non-defaulting user is allowed to keep the swopped clothes until the defaulting user returns.

different.title: Different Or Damaged?
different.text:
Are you sure the cloth is not the same as shown in the photo? Or, do the clothes seem damaged? 

 If so, this cloth will have to be
different.highlight: Please do not proceed with cleaning it.
different.bullet1: If someone has come to drop it, please return to them now.
different.bullet2: If a shipper has come to deliver, please collect the delivery. Another shipper will come to collect it later.
different.btnTx: Yes, Cloth is different or damaged

return_different.title: Different Or Damaged?
return_different.text:
Are you sure the cloth is not the same as shown in the photo? Or, do the clothes seem damaged? 

 If so, this cloth will have to be
return_different.highlight: Please do not proceed with cleaning it.
return_different.bullet1: If someone has come to drop it, please return to them now.
return_different.bullet2: If a shipper has come to deliver, please collect the delivery. Another shipper will come to collect it later.
return_different.btnTx: Yes, Cloth is different or damaged

actionNoShow.title: No Show?
actionNoShow.text: If the shipper could not deliver the cloth from the user,

received.title: Received & Clean?
received.text: Are you sure the cloth is the same as shown in the photo?
received.highlight: Before you proceed with cleaning, please confirm.

return_received.title: Received & Clean?
return_received.text: Are you sure the cloth is the same as shown in the photo?
return_received.highlight: Before you proceed with cleaning, please confirm.

ready.title: Cleaned?
ready.text: Please confirm the cloth is cleaned and ready for delivery

return_ready.title: Cleaned?
return_ready.text: Please confirm the cloth is cleaned and ready for delivery

actionCouldNotPickUp.text: If the shipper could not collect the cloth from the user,

actionProceed.text: Are you sure the cloth is the same as shown in the photo?
actionProceed.highlight: Before you proceed with cleaning, please confirm

actionNotProceed.text: This cloth will have to be returned without cleaning. If someone has come to drop it, please return to them now. If a shipper has come to deliver, please collect the delivery. Another shipper will come to collect it later.
actionNotProceed.highlight: Please do not proceed with cleaning it.
actionNotProceed.btnTx: OK. Will not proceed with cleaning

un_delivered.title: Failed to Deliver?
un_delivered.text: If the shipper could not collect the order, please confirm here.Please
un_delivered.text2: to the shipper for the returned cloth.

return_un_delivered.title: Failed to Deliver?
return_un_delivered.text: If the shipper could not collect the order, please confirm here.Please
return_un_delivered.text2: to the shipper for the returned cloth.

actionPicked.title: Picked?
actionPicked.text: Are you sure the cloth is the same as shown in the photo?
actionPicked.highlight: Before you proceed with cleaning, please confirm.

actionUnPicked.title: Picked?
actionUnPicked.text: The cloth will have to be
actionUnPicked.highlight: Please do not proceed with cleaning it.
actionUnPicked.bullet1: If someone has come to drop it, please return to them now.
actionUnPicked.bullet2: If a shipper has come to deliver, please collect the delivery. Another shipper will come to collect it later.
actionUnPicked.btnTx: OK. Will not proceed with cleaning

questionConfirm.different2: is the same as show in the photo above?

emptyState.noMoreDress:
No more clothes to show :( 
 Why not invite your friends to Swop too? More people would mean more clothes to choose from!
emptyState.needAddMoreClothes: For you to swop, the other person must like something from your wardrobe too. So, add more clothes to your wardrobe to get more matches.
emptyState.noMatchesAvailable: For you to swop, the other person must like something from your wardrobe too. It helps to list nicer clothes, which others are more likely to Like.
emptyState.noSwops:
No active swops yet!!? Start swiping on others's clothes. If others like clothes in your wardrobe too, you'll have matches. You can then pick on from  the many matches for each of your clothes and choose to swap. We'll take care of the rest.
Happing Swopping!

userHome.hasFilter: You're seeing clothes based on filters
userHome.hasLooks: You're seeing clothes inspired from Style Catalogue

laundrySwopDetails.pleaseMakeSure: Please make sure the clothing is the same as in the photo above

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: This feature will be available soon. Stay Tuned!

share.title: Swop - Like . Match . Swap
share.description: Welcome to your wardrobe-on-the-web! Swap your preloved clothes with other women and enjoy endless choices of clothes to wear, for as little as a cup of coffee.
